entry.title: 2x2 LED Troffer Light Fixtures, 30W, 5000K, 2-Pack Dimmable, Perfect Indoor LED Lighting
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Troffers
Price: 171.99

2x2 LED troffer lights to come in square shapes. LED troffer lights work better in modular drop ceilings. These lights are impeccable for educational, hospitality, and other institutions. This 30W LED Troffer Light comes with a CCT of 5000K. These light fixtures will perfectly work at a voltage ranging between 120-277V. LED troffer lights are available with three features: Rebate Eligible, Frosted, and Dimmable that make these lights better than any conventional lights. With a lumen output of 3750 Lumens, these LED Troffer Light Fixtures can easily replace 110W fluorescents. LED troffer lights are a great choice for Ambient Lighting of Interior Commercial Spaces like commercial offices, schools, hospitals, retail merchandising, and many others. It's a UL, DLC, and RoHS certified light fixture that comes with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and a manufacturer warranty of 5-years. These LED Troffer Lights are the modern lighting system that not only provides proper lumens but gives a vibrant look to the place.
